summary: Federal managers often handle complex and risky missions, such as preparing for and responding to natural disasters, and building and managing safe transportation systems. While it is not possible to eliminate all uncertainties in these types of projects, there are strategies that can help plan and manage them. One such strategy is Enterprise Risk Management. title: Enterprise Risk Management: Selected Agencies' Experiences Illustrate Good Practices in Managing Risk
